author: travelandtourworld.com
title: JetBlue CEO to deliver keynote address at Caribbean State of the Industry Tourism ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
JetBlue CEO to deliver keynote address at Caribbean State of the Industry Tourism Conference
The keynote address at the Caribbean Tourism Organization (CTO)’s 2015 State of the Industry Conference in October will be delivered by JetBlue President and CEO Robin Hayes.
The conference will be held this year under the theme Caribbean Tourism: Growth Through Innovation. The conference brings together tourism leaders from across the Caribbean, including ministers, directors of tourism, hotel and airline executives, travel agents, and the media.
JetBlue has been embarking on a significant expansion push throughout the Caribbean region.
In a statement, Hayes says he looks forward to joining the Caribbean Tourism Organization in Curaçao this October to discuss all the exciting developments in this vibrant part of our network Hayes joined JetBlue in 2008 after 19 years of working with British Airways.
He served as executive vice president and chief commercial offer prior to his appointments as president and CEO in 2014 and 2015, respectively.
CTO Secretary General, Hugh Riley said ‘our members will be pleased to welcome Robin Hayes as our keynoter for this valuable conference.’
